name: Oğuzhan Özenç
title: Front-end Developer
about: I am a Front-End Developer with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, dedicated to creating impactful and engaging web experiences. My approach blends technical skills with a passion for storytelling, transforming ideas into dynamic applications.

certification.title: The Frontend Developer Career Path Certification
certification.description: Certified in collaboration with Mozilla MDN, covering the latest best practices in modern web development. The program includes comprehensive training in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, APIs, Web architecture, Responsive design, UI Design, and Git.

responsibilities: Developing a responsive, retro-themed e-commerce website for a t-shirt business.
Designing and implementing a visually engaging landing page.
Creating product pages for apparel and accessories to enhance navigation.
Integrating a blog section using Netlify CMS for content management.
Setting up Shopify for e-commerce functionality, including custom front-end development.
Preparing for final testing and optimization to ensure a launch-ready website.
workExperience.status: In Progress: Landing page completed. Upcoming milestones include product pages, blog integration, e-commerce setup, and final review.

responsibilities: Leading front-end development for a blockchain security web application.
Creating dynamic, responsive interfaces with React and integrating React Router.
Incorporating animations using react-awesome-reveal and implementing a responsive slider with react-slick.
Customizing Netlify (Decap) CMS for content management.
Adding a blog subscription feature for user engagement.
Managing the project lifecycle from concept to deployment.
achievements: Delivered a dynamic web application tailored to blockchain security needs.
Enhanced user engagement through custom features and efficient content management.

responsibilities: Utilized agile methodologies for sustainable product development.
Researched and adopted new technologies, analyzed market trends, and developed technology roadmaps.
Prepared academic writings, patent applications, and technical reports.
Collaborated with partners to ensure projects met industry standards and sustainability goals.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Management Information Systems

projects.name: Homebody - in development
projects.description: Developing a comprehensive, responsive website for a retro/arcade-themed e-commerce business.

projects.name: Offbeat Security
projects.description: A single-page application for a blockchain security business, featuring dynamic interfaces and custom features.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A creative collaboration platform combining video conferencing and HD media streaming.
